1.content: First off, do you want the gainer to be human or experiment?
1.title: Who's it gonna be?

choices: French Fry (Again, but with actual fat)
111.title: lilo

choices: "... Except I'm not!" She said happily, continuing her feast
"...I'd better take a break." She said glumly, going to her room
1111.content:
Experiment 062, nicknamed Frenchy Fry by Lilo, sat in darkness, the grin of a maniac stretching his face. In front of him sat a single steaming french fry. If anyone had been around in the restaurant to see him the sight would have been odd but not a cause for panic, but most people didn't grasp the gravity of the situation. Frenchy Fry had been programmed by Jumba to create incredibly delicious meals with no nutritional content which he used to fatten up his victims. His weakness had always been that due to the minimal nutritional content of his meals the "fat" they caused his victims to gain was only temporary bloating that disappeared in 24 hours. But now, after months of pretending to be a healthy chef, he had finally done it. He had made a normal, oddly delicious, and incredibly fattening french fry. He had overcome the restrictions Jumba had placed upon him and could now make fully nutritious and fattening meals.

Finally, he could fulfill his programming and properly fatten his victims, and the deceitful little experiment would do just that.

**********************

Lilo awoke with a loud and long yawn, having been up late last night. She'd been unable to sleep thanks to the boredom she'd experienced since Stitch had left with Jumba and Pleakly to hunt down a particularly dangerous Experiment without her. They were meant to be looking after her at the moment thanks to Nani having to go away for a week to do a Customer Service course, so she could legally tend to the surf board hire by herself without experience.

This meant that Lilo had been left all alone. Usually leaving a child Lilo's age alone was not a good idea but the young Hawaiian could look after herself, the problem was she was really beginning to struggle to entertain herself.

"Ughhhhhh..." She groaned loudly to no one in particular as she rolled out of bed. "Being a grown up is so boring." She said, not liking having to cook her own breakfast and clean up after herself every morning. "I wish someone else could cook me breakfast just once, I hate making toast." She huffed again as she stripped down.

After taking off her pajamas Lilo stopped and looked down at her olive-skinned body. Lilo was known to be a bit insecure from time to time, and for the first time her body was beginning to fuel that insecurity. It wasn't thin and toned like most girls her age, it was kind of flabby and squishy, perhaps a little squishier than it should have been, even after all her adventures with Stitch.

She grabbed a small roll of flab and gave it a light squeeze, grimacing as she felt her chub squish. She heard the voices of her class mates echoing in her mind, tasing her for being the "fattest" hula dancer except their coach. But in reality, she wasn't really that fat, barely chubby, but that didn't stop her worrying.

Shaking her head and quickly pulling up some panties and one of her signature dresses over her head Lilo walked to her bedroom door and flung it open, only to be stunned by a delicious smell. Amazing smells assaulted her nostrils; bacon, eggs, french toast, fries, pancakes, sausages. Every breakfast food under the sun.

"What..." She muttered in shock, taking another deep breath just to make sure it wasn't her imagination. Realising that her dream to have someone cook her breakfast was coming true, Lilo rushed down into the kitchen, all thoughts of losing weight gone from her mind.

Standing in the kitchen, manning the grill and quickly serving up plate after plate of food stood Experiment 062.

"French Fry!" Lilo called out happily, running and looking at his work enthusiastically. "What're you doing here? Did Jumba tell you to come here and cook me food while they're gone?" She asked, not suspecting French Fries motives at all since his change of heart after last time.

The naughty experiment nodded in conformation and quickly pushed Lilo over to the table and plopped three heavy plates of breakfast food down in front of her. "Bon Appétit!" He shouted with his trademark enthusiasm, before running back over to the grill to continue making his meal.

Lilo stared at the food, a little shocked at her sudden change of circumstance. Suddenly the memory of grabbing her belly fat came back to her, making her look down at her tiny roll of flab pressing into her dress as she sat. However, as she looked down the delicious smells wafted up from her plate and made her mouth water. She thought for a second, her insecure side and her appetite fighting for dominance.

However, as she fought her internal battle, she looked at the plate, saw the delicious bacon glistened with grease, her mouth getting more and more wet as her appetite slowly won.

She knew French Fry only made fat free food now, what could be the problem with indulging a little? And even if he had gone back to his evil ways, only 24 hours of waiting and she'd be back to normal.

Each excuse she made up was another dent in her willpower. She continued thinking until suddenly a little grey hand appeared next to her, grabbed some bacon and shoved it into her mouth.

"Mmph!" She exclaimed as French Fry giggled mischievously, "Bon Appétit!" He shouted again before quickly turning and running back to the grill.

She chewed slowly, savoring each delicious movement before taking a big gulp and swallowing the whole rash in one swallow.

That had made up the young Hawaiian's mind, as French Fry knew it would. Without another moment of hesitation Lilo dived into the food, barely bothering with cutlery as she shoveled food into her hungry mouth.

Finally, something to keep her entertained, an amazing chef to keep her company while also satisfying her sweet tooth. Again, Lilo's wishes where coming true, just like the wish which brought her Stitch.

Lilo ate quickly, shoveling rash of bacon after rash of bacon, egg after egg, pancake after pancake, fried tomato after fried tomato. Whole pounds of food disappeared into the small girl’s mouth, quickly dropping right down into her ravenous belly. And what a belly it was becoming, the once fairly flat belly was beginning to round out with each big mouth full, progressing from a small role of chub to a large, stuffed gut.

Lilo stopped after finishing her third plate, having cleared everything on the table in her gluttonous haze, leaving French Fry shocked by the young girl’s lack of restraint. She flapped her hand around in a lazy attempt to find more food. Finding nothing she lay back and let out a loud burp.

Her hands went down and sat on her belly. It was huge compared to what it had been before, a round, tight bulge almost the size of a watermelon, pushing against her dress and making it ride up to her thighs, almost letting her belly escaping completely. She simply ran her hands over it's hard surface, up and down and side to side along her tight skin, shivering slightly at the wonderful feeling. She pressed against it gently, burping as it's contents moved and some gas was released. She murmured happily and shifted slightly as the delicious taste of her breakfast came back, making her belly churn and beg for more. Much to Lilo's surprise her belly felt good, it was a warm, solid weight that was oddly comforting, and rubbing her sensitive stretched skin felt amazing in ways she'd never felt before.

Most girls would be terrified of such a development, but secure in the knowledge that it was all fat-free food and that she would be fine even if it wasn't, Lilo simply giggled a little before letting out another burp. She gazed up at the three empty plates and marveled at just how hungry she was still feeling despite the heavy lump of food resting in her once ravenous stomach.

Suddenly French Fry jumped up from behind her with an evil grin and dumped another two plates in front of her. "Bon Appétit!" He shouted again before running back away.

Lilo frowned and thought for a second, she trusted French Fry, he was basically family, and the food had been so amazingly delicious and even the giant belly didn't worry her too much, but Nani's voice echoed through her mind, scolding her for being so indulgent.

She slowly picked up a rash of bacon the size of her hand and held it in front of her face. "I'm so full..." She said pausing for a second, feeling her belly churn and grumble as her free hand continued to massage it's surface, still sending shivers up her spine.
1111.title: French Fry (Again, but with actual fat)

112.title: Nani?

1123.content: Nai had never trusted any of any of Jumba's experiments or Jumba himself. However her little sister convinced her that Jumba is no longer capable of any real evil, little did she suspect that there was a plot to fatten her up by....
1123.title: Jumba or one of his experiments.

choices: French Fry is luring her in, Normal food, for now
French Fry's super addictive breakfast Banza
11232.content:
French Fry frowned as his stomach grumbled and he let out a sigh, This had been going on for weeks, no matter what he ate, nothing was satisfying. Ever since Lilo’s sister taught him how to cook wholesomely, a hungry had been brewing inside him. The new style of cooking had been fun at first but it was losing it’s appeal. The sister, Nani, she did this to him. A twisted smile bloomed as he rubbed his four hands together.

“Mmmmmn,” A ray of sunlight pierced through the curtains, shining across Nani’s face. She rolled over with a groan pulling the covers over her head. After a few minutes, she through off the covers with a huff. Glancing at the clock, she saw it was around nine. She sat up with a yawn and a stretch. “Mmmmm, Lilo and Stitch should be out hunting for more experiments, Jumba is in one of his inventing moods and Pleakley is at a Real Estate seminar. My day off and I have the whole house to myself.”

She sleepily crawled out of bed and padded her way to the kitchen. The smell of coffee hit her as she entered.

“What are you doing here?!” She cried as she caught sight on the little blue-grey experiment placing a plate of eggs and toast with coffee at the table. He turns and gets her a wave before pulling out her seat. Nani frowns and glares at him. The poor experiment lowers his head sadly before it perks up, snaps and rushes to the counter. He hastily grabs a sheet of paper and hands it to her.

‘I asked Frenchfry to cook for you today for being the best big sister ever!’ It written messily in crayon. Nani looked up at 062. “Lilo gave you this?”

“Qui!” He replied happily.
11232.title: French Fry's Scheme

choices: Tied Nani to the chair and prepared for forcefeeding
112321.content:
This morning she wouldn’t be an unfortunate hostage in a crazy, food related scheme of his. If she were to deny his offer that is. Instead, Nani took the handwritten note to be true and followed FrenchFry’s gesture for her to be seated at the dining table. Nani properly grabbed fork and knife in each hand as FrenchFry happily slid a hot, delicious, and nutritious plate of breakfast in front of Nani. “Oh! Looks like my teaching has paid off for you hasn’t it? Every meal doesn’t have to be full of carbs and bad fats, now does it?” FrenchFry agreed, smiling as Nani started the meal.

FrenchFry’s all new and improved breakfast consisted of a pile of egg whites, eight strips of turkey bacon, five toasted English muffins slathered with butter and jelly, and just added to the meal, a heaping bowl of fresh oatmeal. “Woah. Eh. Portions are a little big, don’t you think? Don’t worry, I don’t mind having a big breakfast as long as it’s healthy.” Nani dug right in. Biting the strips of bacon that weren’t dry and flaky like store bought brands are. Stabbing the peppered egg whites and enjoying how they’re cooked just to her liking. The muffins, while buttered and jellied, still retained a healthy nature to its taste. Every spoonful of the oatmeal tasted like bliss. It wasn’t just a pile of mush, but it had texture to it!

Nani finished her meal, leaving not a single crumb on the plate. Her enjoyment of the meal dealt away with any concern that FrenchFry would return to his old ways. “Thank you so much!” smiled Nani to FrenchFry as he returned his own. While Nani was ready to start her day off, she could barely muster up the will to budge from the seat. A strong sense of complacency took her over, keeping her stationary. Just the way FrenchFry wanted.

The alien chef kept his smile hidden. He pleaded for Nani to enjoy a second helping of his healthy cuisine.

Nani shrugged, “Who says you can’t have too much of a good thing, huh?”

The second course of breakfast underwent the same treatment as the last, although this time polished off quicker. Never minding the fact she was perfectly full after the first. Nani brushed the turkey bacon crumbs from her tanktop, lightly grazing against her distended stomach. “I’ve got to thank Lilo for asking you to do this. I haven’t had such a good breakfast in ages,” a restrained yawn hovered from Nani. “Before I go, could I have a cup of coffee?” FrenchFry complied and prepared an excellent cup of coffee. Nani handled the cup, noticing the coffee isn’t black. Without a doubt, FrenchFry stirred in a drop of milk. Fat-free no doubt.

In the time Nani took to finish the coffee, FrenchFry…
112321.title: Too much of a good thing?

choices: Nani is clueless and keeps eating
Something doesn't add up to Nani, But what?
1123211.content:
In the time Nani took to finish the coffee, FrenchFry had caught her in his web. Her eyes dilatated as the rich taste assaulted her taste buds. She downed the mug as he slid a third plate in front of her. “I should really get started on the housework.” She says as she picks back up the fork and knife.

“Bon Appetit,” He hums as he climbed up the back of her chair and tied a napkin around her neck. He jumped down and grabbed a hamper fill of dirt laundry as she dug it to the slightly less healthy plate. She moaned lightly as she bit in to a turkey sausage.

“Are you going to do the laundry too?” She asked with a mouth fill out grits.

“Qui!” He replied happily from the other room as he began separating the dirty clothes.

“You are the best!” She hums between bites. Her belly surged forward slightly as did her hips, butt and breasts. Frenchfry grinned darkly from around the corner as he hit the on button for the washing machine with his tail. He sprinted back into the kitchen in his usual whirlwind as the old washer roared to life. He whirled about cooking up another slightly less healthy dish before refilling Nani’s plate.
1123211.title: Another course and free housework

choices: Nani notices her weight gain and tries to leave
FrenchFry comes back in with more food for her
11232111.content:
FrenchFry slid the freshly replenished plate before Nani. She dug in without taking too much care to check what she’s eating. Perhaps it was FrenchFry’s way of manipulating the taste of healthy food that kept her suspicions at bay. Or maybe it was the fact that she’s unknowingly eating fattier and fattier dishes with each completed course.

This time around, FrenchFry cooked egg whites like Nani preferred, except this time he slathered a layer of fattening cheese on top. Her bowl of oatmeal had two whole cups of brown sugar mixed in. The dry, tasteless turkey bacon is replaced with regular pork bacon; extra greasy. A few “whole grain” glazed donuts. All complimented with a cup of heavy cream disguised as skim milk.

Regardless of her dietary intentions, Nani cleared the plate of any crumbs and happily accepted FrenchFry’s next dish. Subtly unhealthier than the last. The alien experiment smiled. Whether Nani had completely given up on her diet or found herself lost in FrenchFry’s control is unknown to him. All he witnesses is Nani’s steady growth as her hips become rounder and wedge within the seat.

In just two hours into the day, FrenchFry had turned Nani's intentions upside down. The woman's stomach has become a black hole just waiting to stuff as much "healthy" food as she could into it. Nani, unfortunately was none of the wiser to his plan.

Her bloated stomach pressing against the waistband of her jean shorts went unnoticed by her. So did the straining of her shirt along her bloated torso. Neither did Nani feel how tight her jeans shorts have become around her buttocks. She remained oblivious to it all, compelled by the taste of FrenchFry's cooking to keep her focus locked on eating.

FrenchFry rubbed his grubby paws together and snuck out of the room to set his next course into action.

“Delicious!” said Nani munching on the last piece of bacon. Not noticing the grease staining her fingers. Looking up from the plate she was immediately disappointed to not find another full plate waiting for her.

“Now, where did that little guy go?”

Nani whipped her head around to see no sign of the alien. The hawiian woman attempted to get on her feet, but felt a force kept her stuck to the chair.

That’s when…
11232111.title: Tastier and Tastier

choices: She is ready for phase two
112321112.content:
That's when Frenchfry breaks her train of thought by setting down another plate in front of her. The rich aroma washes over her as dug in. The experiment let out a sigh of relief as she ate his latest dish, "Whole Grain" waffle drowning in "Low fat" syrup and butter. She nearly broke free of his influence and discover what he was up too, but pretty soon it wouldn't matter. She was fattening up nicely, even on this hybrid food he was serving her.

Her face was still relatively thin aside from the small hint of a double chin forming. Her breasts had shot up a cup size or two and now overflowed the cups of her bra and strained her tank top. Said tank top rode up over her exposing the top half on her belly as her shorts cut deep into the fat, straining the button to it's near breaking point. It swelled out like she was eight months pregnant, only soft and flabby. But her lower half, that is were her growth really shined. Her hips smooshed against the armrests of the chair, leaving her wedge in her seat. Her butt ozooed through the bar of the back of the chair and her thigh were clearly squished together as fat peaked out of small tears along the seam.

He grinned as she let out a soft moan, "Mmmm, so good. I feel so full but I am still hungry." He quickly sprung into action, whipping her up a new dish. Within moments as large plate full donuts and tall glass of milkshake found there way in front of her. She took a sip and groaned in joy. "Mmm, why can't my health shake ever taste like this."

He grinned before turning back to the armrests that nearly ruined him. He quickly went to work removing them. He unscrewed them only to find them suck on her fat hips. He face palmed as he slowly inched them off her hips. Now that that was done no longer an obstacle, phase two would go a lot smoother now. He watched as she licked the sugar and glaze off her fingers. He quickly replaced the shake with another heavy cream, "Healthy" shake chalked full of weight gain powder. She looked at him with puppy eyes as she handed him her plate, "More please?"

groaning in pain before what ever was in side of her continued it's movements with laughter, her stomached bouncing up and down bringing her form with it as she moved violently through the house as the creature within her tried to escape before settling down after destroying the living room.

Nani recovering from that experience, looked once more down on her bloated stomach in horror before

11333111.title: Let's go see Mertle then!

113331111.content:
And orange alien hops out of the bushes and shoots Mertle. He flees.

"What was that? Oh well."

Mertle finished off the hot dog and bought another.

"Hmmm I'm hungry."

She kept buying until she ran out of money. Her belly was rounder.

Her friends walked away in shock. She had eaten 10 at least. But she was still hungry!

She asked the hot dog vender for another, but he refused. She didn't have any more money after all. Mertle didn't take his refusal too well. she jumped onto the cart and shoved food into her mouth. He tried to stop her, but slipped on hot dog grease. He was knocked unconscious. People stared as Mertle put down hot dog, after hot dog. When she ate all the dogs, her belly had grown 4 times larger.

121322.content:
experiment 628 - primary function- the consumption and absorption/assimilation of all matter/energy via symbiotic union with a host.

description- think of a slightly larger reddish orange version of ex.222(poxy)

info: why jumba give 628 this function he has forgotten but that doesn't make it any less dangerous, upon activation it infects the 1st host it comes in contact with, after which it changes it to suit it's needs:physical changes: a mouth able to stretch open to large proportions and be able to eat things that would otherwise be unconsumable(teeth that can rip/tear/crush anything and a long elastic tongue), a stomach that can expand to a enormous size/hold a great deal of stuff/and can also digest anything almost instantly and convert into fat, make the host body virtually indestructible(to the point where they also can't drown and survive in space)and can grow infintly fatter, makes the body absorb everything(matter/energy) is produces no waste. mental changes: insatiable appetite, lose of ethics/morals/manners, a desire to grow and consume anything and everything and gains telekiness and gravity manipulation that grows as she does. the host gains the power to absorb energy(even the light and heat given off by what it eats) like from attacks/weapons/power sources, even stars to grow fatter. the host also have the ability to turn their bodies into weapons depending on what they had eaten(think wapol from one piece) and if they eat a living thing they gain it not just their mass but also their: memories, knowledge, talents, personality, habits, speech patterns, physical abilities/powers, life force etc. over all the more they consume the larger/fatter they get and they wouldn't ever stop.

note: after infecting the host it takes 12hrs for 628 to fully corrupts its host's mind
